channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Personal Cloud Storage A1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Personal Cloud Storage A1

item.title: CVE-2021-42852|2024-08-04T03:38:50.310Z -- lenovo -- personal%20cloud%20storage%20a1
item.description: A command injection vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Personal Cloud Storage devices that could allow an authenticated user to execute operating system commands by sending a crafted packet to the device.

item.title: CVE-2021-42848|2024-08-04T03:38:50.160Z -- lenovo -- personal%20cloud%20storage%20a1
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Personal Cloud Storage devices that could allow an unauthenticated user to retrieve device and networking details.

item.title: CVE-2021-42849|2024-08-04T03:38:50.219Z -- lenovo -- personal%20cloud%20storage%20a1
item.description: A weak default password for the serial port was reported in some Lenovo Personal Cloud Storage devices that could allow unauthorized device access to an attacker with physical access.

item.title: CVE-2021-42851|2024-08-04T03:38:50.248Z -- lenovo -- personal%20cloud%20storage%20a1
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Personal Cloud Storage devices that could allow an unauthenticated user to create a standard user account.

item.title: CVE-2021-42850|2024-08-04T03:38:50.139Z -- lenovo -- personal%20cloud%20storage%20a1
item.description: A weak default administrator password for the web interface and serial port was reported in some Lenovo Personal Cloud Storage devices that could allow unauthorized device access to an attacker with physical or local network access.
